textBeforeTable: Scouting Audibles Bio Videos Statistics Updates USC tailback Silas Redd has been battling back from injuries this season, but so far he has yet to see any game action. We talked to Redd about what he is doing to try and get back on the field.[details] The Latest: Redd thinks he's ready — 9/30/2013   Kris Albarado Joey Augello Jordan Austin Zach Banner Quinn Bassler Kenny Bigelow Matt Boermeester Chris Brown Max Browne Reid Budrovich Kevin Carrasco Jalen Cope-Fitzpatrick Su'a Cravens Justin Davis Lamar Dawson Ryan Dillard Malik Dorton Chuma Edoga Nico Falah Scott Felix Joel Foy Jalen Greene Joe Harding Ajene Harris Chris Hawkins Roy Hemsley Don Hill Michael Hutchings Adoree' Jackson Erick Jepsen Jalen Jones George Katrib Cody Kessler Robby Kolanz Toa Lobendahn Jonathan Lockett Matt Lopes Tre Madden Damien Mama
